QuestData.Title: Protect the Home Front
QuestData.Description: The Legion hasn't just invaded this city. Their evil is spreading across Azeroth, threatening the far corners of our world.$b$bWe must seek them out and stop them, everywhere their darkness touches.$b$bWe've dispatched scouts around the world to watch for Legion activity. As invasions arise, we'll mark the locations on your map.$b$bMake them suffer, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Open your map to find an active Legion invasion in Kalimdor or Eastern Kingdoms. Go to the invasion site and stop the demons!
QuestData.RewardText: You've done it! You've broken an invasion!$b$bIf only that had ended our campaign. But the Legion will never relent until they are destroyed... or have destroyed us.$b$bDon't let up! Fight off more of these wretched invasions, $n. The wyrmtongue we're holding captive here will reward your efforts.
